  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bag
    Bag class represents the game's random student extraction.
    BagTest
    Method BagTest tests the Bag class.
    Cloud
    Cloud class represent the clouds to be selected at the end of the turn to refill the player's school.
    Game
    The Game class contains the main Model (MVC) logic of "Eriantys".
    MotherNature
    MotherNature class represents the game Mother Nature, determined by its position.
    Player
    Player class represents the user and player of the board game.
    School
    School class represents the game's school boards, which contain the students' hall and entry and the player's towers.
